DOC.brief_summary: After extraction of the cell-free DNA circulating in maternal plasma, we aim at developing new techniques for fetal DNA enrichment to perform fetal gender determination, and indirect diagnosis of inherited diseases like Cystic Fibrosis, Huntington Disease, Myotonic Dystrophy, B-Thalassaemia...
DOC.brief_title: Development of New Prenatal Diagnostic Tests From Maternal Blood
